name: Fazbear's Ghost Party
description:
Just short puzzle game with fnaf characters.

_______________________

STORY:

Eng:

In a far-off kingdom, the ancient tomb of William has awakened and a huge number of evil spirits have deliberately broken free. People in fear turn to Master of Souls (Marionette). To put the protective seals on the tomb, he enlisted the help of three ghosts of great warriors, Freddie, Bonnie and Chica.

[Sorry is my bad English]

_______________________

HOW TO PLAY:

W, A, S, D - Up, Left, Down, Right.

Esc - back to the menu.

R - restart.

_______________________

Credits:

Redplay_1 - Graphics, Ideas, Sound (one soundtrack) and Coding.

Scott Cawthon - Original creator a FNAF series.

Few soundtracks by Console Cabaret and Kevin Macleod.
